column5: Hey all. So I have a late 80's 35HP merc with no power trim (boat is a console) and I was wondering if there is an option to add it on a budget?  Best I have found so far is about $1000 and that's way more than I want to spend.  Any help, advise and even links to product really helps.  Thanks. G
Get an outboard hydrofoil. Relatively inexpensive and it'll help get on plane faster.
Used CMC tilts come up occasionally. I have one I will likely be selling next year. I’ve got a 65 merc on it.
Good to know.  Where are you located?
